Package io.frictionlessdata.tableschema.tabledatasource

package io.frictionlessdata.tableschema.tabledatasource
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    io.frictionlessdata.tableschema
     
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractTableDataSource<T>
     
    BeanTableDataSource<C>
    Implements a TableDataSource based on a Java Bean class.
    CsvTableDataSource
    Implements a TableDataSource based on CSV-Data in: An InputStream An remote URL A local File A String To define CSV properties like record delimiters or whether the data has a header row, the class uses the Apache Commons CSV CSVFormat class.
    JsonArrayTableDataSource
    Implements a TableDataSource based on a Jackson ArrayNode holding JSON-encoded table.
    StringArrayTableDataSource
     
    TableDataSource
    Interface defining the structure holding data for a Table.
    TableDataSource.Format
    Data format, currently either CSV or JSON.
